page.title: 12AT HOME
page.content: My name is Samantha Knapton. At home I usually play with my dolls.Most of the dolls have clothes that have been bought.I have a Twirly curls Barbie which I call Rachel and a Crystal Ken which I call Christopher and a Sindy which I call Sandra. I've a Dutch doll (which my dad brought back from Holland) which I call Phill and I've got a sailor doll which I call Teena.I have two fashion dolls call Hazel and Jennifer and a lot of other dolls.My Barbie is my favourite doll.She has a twirly-curler and a purple-chair.I sometimes play outside but that is when it is not raining.I watch television often and I watch a lot.When I come home from school at 3.50 I watch ITV until 4.20 when I watch B.B.C 1.
